title: O.V.E.R.L.O.A.D One Day… I Am a Villainess - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Shoujo   Supernatural
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Family   Female Protagonist   Heroes   Siblings   Special Abilities   Transmigration   Transported into a Game World   Villainess Noble Girls
author: เจ้าถั่วดำ
description:
There’s no time to get sad over some guy anymore.

Because I’m this beautiful, merciless, blonde with big busts.

I also have a handsome big brother, a good-looking little brother and a lovely youngest brother.

But there’s a drawback to that…I am a villainess. (That’s the best part though.)>
